_sText:
Players start on opposite sides of the spawn facing different directions making it very difficult to jump into spawn.

There are weapon spawns for every riffle and Machine gun strewn about on the map

There is a port to the top after a very easy surf.

From there it breaks up to noob and pro surf.

At the end of noob there is a port to top, a machine gun spawner, and a teleporter to the upper portion of jail (see screenshot) which holds the release switch to jail.

At the end of pro there is a port to top, a low gravity spawner, and a port to underneath the jail which holds the kill switch. Also, the pro finish overlooks the noob finish with a 1 way wall.
